VIII. CLOSER RELATIONSHIP ORGANIZATIONALLY
In addition to the close cooperation and mutual under¬
standing whidi has been evident on the part of all NAEB and NETRC
officers and staff immediately involved in the present discussions
and ^faich gives excellent promise of smooth working relationships

(1) NETRC intends to invite the President of NAEB to
